content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 23}, {"type": "skeleton_spawn_egg", "quantity": 52, "index": 26}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 10, "index": 28}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 13, "index": 29}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 46, "index": 36}]
thought: To craft a jungle pressure plate, I need to place two jungle planks in the crafting table. Since there are two jungle planks in slot 23, I will first move one to slot 1.
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "skeleton_spawn_egg", "quantity": 52, "index": 26}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 10, "index": 28}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 13, "index": 29}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 46, "index": 36}]
thought: Since I have already moved one jungle plank into the crafting table, I need to move another one next to it. I will move the second plank from slot 23 to slot 2.
act: move from slot 23 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "skeleton_spawn_egg", "quantity": 52, "index": 26}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 10, "index": 28}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 13, "index": 29}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 46, "index": 36}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the jungle pressure plate, I need to move it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
